column2: 5 mCi of Tc-99m pertechnetate was given to the patient per oral, and serial dynamic images of the thorax were obtained.
column3:
Esophageal transit time is within normal range.
No significant retention of radiotracer in the esophagus.

column2: 20 mCi of Tc-99m HDP was intravenously injected, and whole body and spot images were obtained 3 hours later.
column3:
No osseous lesions suspicious for metastatic disease.
Other findings: none.
column4: No scintigraphic evidence of bone metastasis.
